body:
My username is MTINC for those who do not yet know me and I just recently created my account. Today I was trying to add some more information to it and so I hit 'edit profile'. However, the webpage then turned blank and read:

Oops! Google Chrome could not find editDid you mean: edit.­com


I was wondering if anyone else encountered the same issue while attempting to add more information to their account. If so, the solution to the problem would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

title: Editing my profile

replies.body: I got the same problem. Dont feel alone.
replies.body_tagged: I got the same problem. Dont feel alone.

replies.body:
I created a topic about this a month ago when I started to play on Avicus, I was told they are working on a new version of the web and if I want to edit my profile I have to go to.

http://avicus.net/username/edit

In your case.

http://avicus.net/MTINC/edit
